      <div class="contentWrap">
       <h2>
        myWakeHealth Patient Portal
       </h2>
       <div class="image-col">
        <a href="/mywakehealth/" id="ctl00_ctl00_cpMainArea_lvMainContent_ctrl1_lvMCPics_ctrl0_aImageLink">
         <img alt="Wait Times Mom" border="0" src="/uploadedImages/User_Content/PatientsAndVisitors/Images/WaitTimes Mom web.jpg?n=8601" title="Wait Times Mom"/>
        </a>
        <img alt="Wait Times Mom" border="0" src="/uploadedImages/User_Content/PatientsAndVisitors/Images/WaitTimes Mom web.jpg?n=8601" style="display:none;" title="Wait Times Mom"/>
       </div>
       <div class="content-col">
        <p>
         <a href="/mywakehealth/" title="Sign up for our FREE patient portal today">
          Sign up for our FREE patient portal today
         </a>
         .
        </p>
        <p>
         At Wake Forest Baptist, we are committed to providing our patients with a simple, secure way to access their medical information (such as lab results and future appointments) and e-mail their healthcare providers for more information (including prescription refills) about their care.
        </p>
        <p>
         Access your health information online, anytime. Please view our
         <a href="/myWakeHealth-FAQ.htm" title="MyWakeHealth Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)">
          Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
         </a>
         section for information on how to get started.
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="contentWrap">
       <h2>
        Be Involved in Changing the Future of Health Care
       </h2>
       <div class="image-col">
        <a href="/beinvolved/" id="ctl00_ctl00_cpMainArea_lvMainContent_ctrl2_lvMCPics_ctrl0_aImageLink">
         <img alt="Be Involved 177" border="0" src="/uploadedImages/User_Content/AboutUs/Images/beinvolved177.jpg?n=4397" title="Be Involved 177"/>
        </a>
        <img alt="Be Involved 177" border="0" src="/uploadedImages/User_Content/AboutUs/Images/beinvolved177.jpg?n=4397" style="display:none;" title="Be Involved 177"/>
       </div>
       <div class="content-col">
        <p>
         The treatments of tomorrow are being developed today by the ideas and innovations of our scientists and physicians. But these ideas and innovations require scientific study to advance.
        </p>
        <p>
         Wake Forest Baptist Health conducts hundreds of clinical trials every year in an effort to detect, treat and prevent disease. By participating in a research study, you may provide future generations with the promise of better health.
        </p>
        <ul>
         <li>
          <a href="http://www.wakehealth.edu/BeInvolved/Register.aspx" title="Sign up to learn more about clinical studies">
          </a>
          <a href="http://www.wakehealth.edu/beinvolved/" title="Learn more about Be Involved">
           Learn more about Be Involved
          </a>
          .
         </li>
         <li>
          <a href="http://www.wakehealth.edu/BeInvolved/Search.aspx?r=t" title="Search for studies that match criteria you select">
           Search for studies that match criteria you select
          </a>
          .
         </li>
         <li>
          <a href="http://www.wakehealth.edu/Research/Be-Involved-Video-Gallery.htm" title="Watch our patient testimonial and TV spot">
           Watch our patient testimonials and TV spot
          </a>
          .
         </li>
         <li>
          Clinical study FAQs for
          <a href="http://www.wakehealth.edu/BeInvolved/FAQ.aspx?t=v" title="volunteers">
           volunteers
          </a>
          ,
          <a href="http://www.wakehealth.edu/BeInvolved/FAQ.aspx?t=r" title="researchers">
           researchers
          </a>
          .
          <br/>
          <br/>
         </li>
        </ul>
       </div>

       <div class="top">
        <h2>

        </h2>
        <div class="rc active">
         <div class="image-col">
          <a href="/News-and-Media/ITN/Wake-Forest-Baptist-Offers-New-Breakthrough-3D-Technology-in-Surgery.htm">
           <img alt="CB" border="0" class="img-fl" src="/uploadedImages/User_Content/AboutUs/News_Media_Resources/WFUBMC_In_The_News/Branch Orbeye.JPG" title="Wake Forest Baptist Offers New Breakthrough 3-D Technology in Surgery"/>
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="content-col">
          <h3>
           <a href="/News-and-Media/ITN/Wake-Forest-Baptist-Offers-New-Breakthrough-3D-Technology-in-Surgery.htm">
            Wake Forest Baptist Offers New Breakthrough 3-D Technology in Surgery
           </a>
          </h3>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p style="margin: 0px 0px 1.5em; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-size: 12px; font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);">
           Wake Forest Baptist is the first hospital in the Southeast and just the second in the world to own a device that allows operating room staff and medical students to see in 4K (ultra-high-definition) 3-D.
          </p>
          <ul style="margin: 0px 1.5em 1.5em 2em; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-size: 12px; font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);">
           <li style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">
            View the coverage from
            <a href="http://www.wxii12.com/article/groundbreaking-surgical-microscope-available-at-wake-forest-baptist-medical-center/20982702" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68);">
             WXII
            </a>
            and
            <a href="https://www.wfmynews2.com/article/news/local/wake-forest-baptist-second-in-world-to-have-orbeye-technology/83-559658206" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68);">
             WFMY
            </a>
            .
           </li>
           <li style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">
            Read the
            <a href="http://www.wakehealth.edu/News-Releases/2018/Wake_Forest_Baptist_Offers_New_Breakthrough_3D_Technology_in_Surgery.htm" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68);">
             news release
            </a>
            .
           </li>
          </ul>
          <p style="margin: 0px 0px 1.5em; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-size: 12px; font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);">
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <a href="/News-and-Media/ITN/Wake-Forest-Baptist-Offers-New-Breakthrough-3D-Technology-in-Surgery.htm">
           <img alt="Wake Forest Baptist Offers New Breakthrough 3-D Technology in Surgery" border="0" src="/images/ITN_View_More.png" title="Wake Forest Baptist Offers New Breakthrough 3-D Technology in Surgery"/>
          </a>

        </div>
        <div class="rc">
         <div class="image-col">
          <a href="/News-and-Media/ITN/Wake-Forest-School-of-Medicine-Students-Learn-Medicine-in-the-Wild.htm">
           <img alt="WildernessMedicine" border="0" class="img-fl" src="/uploadedImages/User_Content/AboutUs/News_Media_Resources/Images_In_The_News/Ness.jpg" title="Wake Forest School of Medicine Students Learn Medicine in the Wild"/>
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="content-col">
          <h3>
           <a href="/News-and-Media/ITN/Wake-Forest-School-of-Medicine-Students-Learn-Medicine-in-the-Wild.htm">
            Wake Forest School of Medicine Students Learn Medicine in the Wild
           </a>
          </h3>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           To help prepare future physicians to practice medicine in low
resource settings, Wake Forest School of Medicine offers the wilderness
medicine interest group to medical students.
          </p>
          <p>
           View the coverage in the
           <a href="http://www.journalnow.com/news/local/pizza-box-splints-medical-students-learn-how-to-treat-patients/article_05da2a52-076c-5598-a822-d58b6d0e7ac5.html">
            Winston-Salem
Journal
           </a>
           and
           <a href="http://spectrumlocalnews.com/nc/triangle-sandhills/news/2018/05/01/students-learn-wilderness-medicine">
            Spectrum
News
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           Read the
           <a href="http://www.wakehealth.edu/News-Releases/2018/Wake_Forest_School_of_Medicine_Students_Learn_Medicine_in_the_Wild.htm">
            news
release
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <a href="/News-and-Media/ITN/Wake-Forest-School-of-Medicine-Students-Learn-Medicine-in-the-Wild.htm">
           <img alt="Wake Forest School of Medicine Students Learn Medicine in the Wild" border="0" src="/images/ITN_View_More.png" title="Wake Forest School of Medicine Students Learn Medicine in the Wild"/>
          </a>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="rc">
         <div class="image-col">
          <a href="/News-and-Media/ITN/Prosthetic-Memory-System-Successful-in-Humans.htm">
           <img alt="brain" border="0" class="img-fl" src="/uploadedImages/User_Content/AboutUs/News_Media_Resources/Images_In_The_News/brain.jpg" title="Prosthetic Memory System Successful in Humans"/>
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="content-col">
          <h3>
           <a href="/News-and-Media/ITN/Prosthetic-Memory-System-Successful-in-Humans.htm">
            Prosthetic Memory System Successful in Humans
           </a>
          </h3>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Scientists at Wake Forest Baptist Medical Center have demonstrated the successful implementation of a prosthetic system that uses a person’s own memory patterns to facilitate the brain’s ability to encode and recall memory.  In the pilot study, participants’ short-term memory performance showed a 35 to 37 percent improvement over baseline measurements. The research was funded by the U.S. Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency.
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            View the coverage in
            <a href="https://www.forbes.com/sites/daviddisalvo/2018/03/29/scientists-say-they-have-developed-a-memory-restoring-prosthetic-for-the-human-brain/#31558ea3b749" target="_blank">
             Forbes
            </a>
            ,
            <a href="http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/p062p2jw" target="_blank">
             BBC News
            </a>
            ,
            <a href="https://www.wired.com/story/hippocampal-neural-prosthetic/" target="_blank">
             Wired
            </a>
            and
            <a href="https://www.popularmechanics.com/technology/a19709853/this-darpa-developed-brain-implant-can-help-recover-your-memories/" target="_blank">
             Popular Mechanics
            </a>
            .
           </li>
           <li>
            Read the
            <a href="http://www.wakehealth.edu/News-Releases/2018/Prosthetic_Memory_System_Successful_in_Humans_Study_Finds.htm">
             news release
            </a>
            .
           </li>
           <li>
            Find out more about
            <a href="http://www.wakehealth.edu/physpharm/">
             Physiology and Pharmacology
            </a>
            .
           </li>
          </ul>
          <a href="/News-and-Media/ITN/Prosthetic-Memory-System-Successful-in-Humans.htm">
           <img alt="Prosthetic Memory System Successful in Humans" border="0" src="/images/ITN_View_More.png" title="Prosthetic Memory System Successful in Humans"/>
          </a>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="rc">
         <div class="image-col">
          <a href="/News-and-Media/ITN/Scientists-Use-Nanotechnology-to-Detect-Molecular-Biomarker-for-Osteoarthritis.htm">
           <img alt="nanomedicine hall small" border="0" class="img-fl" src="/uploadedImages/User_Content/AboutUs/News_Media_Resources/Images_In_The_News/09-17 Nanomedicine Hall in the news.jpg" title="Scientists Use Nanotechnology to Detect Molecular Biomarker for Osteoarthritis"/>
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="content-col">
          <h3>
           <a href="/News-and-Media/ITN/Scientists-Use-Nanotechnology-to-Detect-Molecular-Biomarker-for-Osteoarthritis.htm">
            Scientists Use Nanotechnology to Detect Molecular Biomarker for Osteoarthritis
           </a>
          </h3>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           For the first time, scientists at Wake Forest Baptist Medical Center
           <a href="http://www.wakehealth.edu/" title="Wake Forest Baptist Medical Center ">
            <strong>
            </strong>
           </a>
           have been able to measure a specific molecule indicative of osteoarthritis and a number of other inflammatory diseases using a newly developed technology.
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            View the news coverage in
            <a href="https://www.genengnews.com/gen-news-highlights/osteoarthritis-biomarker-detected-using-nanotechnology/81255575" target="_blank" title="Genetic Engineering &amp; Biotechnology News">
             Genetic Engineering &amp; Biotechnology News
            </a>
            and
            <a href="https://www.technologynetworks.com/analysis/news/nanotechnology-detects-molecular-biomarker-for-osteoarthritis-298545" target="_blank" title="Technology Networks.">
             Technology Networks.
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            Read the
            <a href="http://www.wakehealth.edu/News-Releases/2018/Scientists_Use_Nanotechnology_to_Detect_Molecular_Biomarker_for_Osteoarthritis.htm" title=" news release.">
             news release.
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            Find out more about
            <a href="http://www.wakehealth.edu/Biomedical-Engineering/" title="Biomedical Engineering">
             Biomedical Engineering
            </a>
            .
           </li>
          </ul>
          <a href="/News-and-Media/ITN/Scientists-Use-Nanotechnology-to-Detect-Molecular-Biomarker-for-Osteoarthritis.htm">
           <img alt="Scientists Use Nanotechnology to Detect Molecular Biomarker for Osteoarthritis" border="0" src="/images/ITN_View_More.png" title="Scientists Use Nanotechnology to Detect Molecular Biomarker for Osteoarthritis"/>
          </a>
         </div>
